attributes.action: stop so called charities who call up businesses insisting that the owners have agreed to back a campaign when they clearly havent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I personally receive 3 or 4 calls per week from these so called charity organisations. They insist I have agreed by way of verbal contract to back their campaign when I most definately have not. All these people are, are bare faced liars who live in hope that when they threaten with legal action that really and truly they cant back up, that people will just pay up. They give real charities a bad name. It has to stop and it has to stop now.
